data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of deep-sea glass sponge (Porifera, Hexactinellida, Aulocalycidae) from the Indian Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sautya, Sabyasachi, Tabachnick, Konstantin R., Ingole, Baban (2011): A new genus and species of deep-sea glass sponge (Porifera, Hexactinellida, Aulocalycidae) from the Indian Ocean. ZooKeys 136: 13-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.136.1626, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.136.1626
